name: Ring My Bell安妮塔华德79年冠军单曲
lyric:
ring my bell歌词
顺子 - Ring My Bell

I'm glad you're home
and did you really miss me?
I guess you did by the look in your eyes
well I'm back and relax
while I put away the dishes
then you and me can‘t look back

you can ring my bell ring my bell （anytime anywhere)
you can ring my bell ring my bell

you can ring my bell ring my bell （anytime anywhere)
you can ring my bell ring my bell

the night is young and full of possibilities
well come on and let yourself be free
my love for you
so long i've been saving
the night was made for you and me

you can ring my bell ring my bell （anytime anywhere)
you can ring my bell ring my bell

you can ring my bell ring my bell （anytime anywhere)
you can ring my bell ring my bell

the night's still young
i sing my song to the horizon i go along ride
on the waves stroll with the tides
slip into ocean-ocean's inind
just hold on and make a wish
to the starry starry sky
close your eyes and reminesce
some things money just can't buy
the pot of gold-at our reach
the rainbow proudly presents itself
two of kind
that's what we are what we are ,it's what we are
heads up high reach for the sky
it's the only place to be
step on the gas drive real quick
fast car ,fast car ,ya see

you can ring my bell
you can ring my bell ding dong ding yeah
anytime, anywhere
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 poiu 编辑于2019-09-11 15:22
